title: Borderlands 3 DLC Reveal, Massive Update - Kinda Funny Games Daily 11.20.19
description:
Go to http://thirdlove.com/games now to find your perfect-fitting bra and get 15% off your first purchase!

Hurry to http://upstart.com/KFGAMES to find out HOW
LOW your Upstart rate is!

Go to http://getquip.com/games right now and you’ll get your first refill FREE.

Gary Whitta and Greg talk about Borderlands 3's update, Gary campaigns for Luigi's Mansion 3, and Kevin breaks Whitta's heart.

Time Stamps - 
00:06:50 - Housekeeping
LONDON CALLING! @MCFixer on Twitter
Thank you to our Patreon Producers: Black Jack, Zack Parsley, Mohammed Mohammed
The Roper Report   -
00:08:55 - Borderlands Updates
00:17:15- Half-Life: Alyx Set between 1 & 2, Matt Kim @ IGN
00:27:25 - Bobby Kotick on HIS Politics in Games, James Batchelor @ GIB
00:35:21 - Pokemon Sword and Shield coming to Smash (in Japan), Chris Priestman @ IGN
00:36:58 - EverQuest Developer Passes Away, James Batchelor @ GIB
00:38:58 - Former Directors of Arkane Studios Announce New Independent Game Studio (Director, please show this.)
00:41:15 - Out today
00:47:32 -  THIRDLOVE
00:49:00 - QUIP
00:50:00 - UPSTART
Reader mail   -
00:52:17 - Will Nintendo games ever be taken seriously enough to win GOTY? - Suck sandwich
00:58:00 - Is this an indictment on what the game awards really mean to big AAA developers? - Evan M
01:06:52 - Squad Up: Jeffrey P Long(Xbox One) - Jeffrey P Long
01:07:39 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts:Greg and Imran
